title: Health Insurance Guidance for International Students in Iran
sub-title: Stay Protected & Secure with the Right Health Insurance Plan
introduction: Healthcare and medical expenses can be costly, and having proper health insurance is essential for international students studying in Iran. A good health insurance plan helps students access medical services, reduce healthcare costs, and ensure peace of mind during their stay. We provide comprehensive guidance to help students choose and obtain the best insurance plan suited to their needs.

whyInsurance.title: Why is Health Insurance Important?
whyInsurance.point1-desc: Covers expenses for doctor visits, medications, and hospital treatments.
whyInsurance.point2-desc: Get treatment from hospitals and clinics affiliated with insurance providers.
whyInsurance.point3-desc: Be financially protected in case of accidents or sudden illnesses.
whyInsurance.point4-title: Ensures Compliance with University & Visa Requirements
whyInsurance.point4-desc: Many universities require students to have health insurance.

insuranceTypes.title: Types of Health Insurance Plans Available
insuranceTypes.type1-desc: Offered by some universities to international students.
insuranceTypes.type2-desc: Provides wider coverage for students needing advanced healthcare services.
insuranceTypes.type3-desc: Suitable for students planning a long-term stay in Iran.
insuranceTypes.type4-desc: Covers additional costs not included in basic insurance plans.

howToApply.step2-title: Select the Best Plan for You

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is health insurance mandatory for international students in Iran?
faq.a1: Some universities require students to have health insurance, and it is strongly recommended for all students.
faq.q2: What medical services are covered by health insurance?
faq.a2: Coverage depends on the insurance plan but typically includes doctor visits, hospital stays, medication, and emergency care.
faq.q3: How can I renew my health insurance?
faq.a3: Most health insurance policies need annual renewal. We help students through the renewal process.
faq.q4: Does health insurance cover dental care?
faq.a4: Some insurance plans include dental coverage, but this is usually part of supplementary insurance.
